snippet: A man faced murder charges on Friday after accidentally shooting his friend while testing out a bulletproof vest, Baltimore Police said.
abstract: Mark Ramiro faces murder charges in Baltimore after accidentally shooting his friend Darnell Mitchell while testing bulletproof vest.
lead_paragraph: A man faced murder charges on Friday after accidentally shooting his friend while testing out a bulletproof vest, Baltimore Police said.

headline.main: Maryland: Man Is Shot Dead in Test of Bulletproof Vest
headline.print_headline: Maryland: Man Is Shot Dead in Test of Bulletproof Vest
